title: The Old Man Who Got a Second Round in Another World - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Harem   Seinen
tags: Adapted to Manga   Beastkin   Cooking   Devoted Love Interests   Dungeons   Elves   Game Elements   Harsh Training   Kind Love Interests   Level System   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Male Protagonist   Mature Protagonist   Monsters   Overpowered Protagonist   Polygamy   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Reincarnated in a Game World   Romantic Subplot   Shield User   Strong Love Interests   Strong to Stronger   Sword And Magic   Weak to Strong
author: Tsukiyo Rui   月夜　涙（るい）
description: A veteran adventurer was preparing for his retirement when his former disciple returned to the village, intending to recruit the old man to his party. Filled with regret due to an incident that happened in his first party, the old man rejected his offer. Being affected by his disciple’s adventurous spirit, the old man leaves in hopes of reigniting his long lost dream, to become the strongest adventurer that ever lived.>
